page.title: 10 Tourism.
page.content: Leven is popular with holidaymakers as it has a sandy beach safe for children Along the promenade there are putting and bowling greens,a golf course, an amusement arcade,a paddling pool and fairground and a caravan park. Special attractions this year should suit all the family. For the children a fancy dress parade, Mr Muscles competition or join the Chummy Fun Club.There is to be a dog show,a whippet race but the biggest animal attraction will surely be Hercules the Bear! Coming in his Hercmobile he will be wrestling with Andy Robin the champion wrestler in an exhibition. A hypnotist, comedians, pop groups, folk music and a pipe band will be appearing in shows. With all that we wondered if there could be complaints? Broken glass and litter on the beach perhaps or rainy weather?
